Room Type
Bedroom, Living Room
  • Voice control & Remote Control After connecting Alexa and Hey Google, you can voice control the smart ceiling lamp to turn on and off the light, adjust the brightness, and even change the light color. The connection only supports 2.4GHz WIFI. You can also easily control the ceiling light through the 2.4G remote control, or you can control it through the App outdoors, which is very convenient.
  • High quality built-in bluetooth speakerYou can connect via a Bluetooth mobile phone and play your favorite music. It also provides a rhythm mode, which can realize the synergy of colored lights and music rhythm, which is very suitable for family gatherings. The speaker can still be used when the lights are turned off. (Note: The speaker is an independent part of the lamp, it can NOT be used as amazon echo)
  • Energy Saving & Eyes protectionSaving 80% energy by replacing 100W traditional Incandescent lights with 36W LED, automatically adjust the color temperature to maintain the quality of the light is intended to protect the eyes.
  • Memory function & timer Click the memory function to keep the last light setting. The lamps can also be set with a schedule or timer to automatically turn on or off the lamps for you. (Reminder: The condition to realize the memory function is to keep the lights on and off for more than 10s)
  • Easy to InstallCeiling lamp installation can be done easily and independently,Even women can easily complete the installation alone.

Product description

HOREVO WiFi Smart Alexa Ceiling Light

Smart Control: Through the APP "Smart Life" or "TuyaSmart", the LED ceiling light can be controlled anytime and anywhere. Compatible with Alexa and Google Assistant for voice control.

Easy to install: The installation of the ceiling light can be easily done without any help.

Super bright lamp beads: No flickering to protect your eyes. High quality 360 diffuse LED lamp beads illuminate your home, bring you soft light, eliminate dark areas and make the lamp durable.

    Customers find the ceiling light easy to install and appreciate its brightness features, with one mentioning adjustable settings for low/nightlight use. The color quality receives positive feedback, with one customer noting its glitter-like appearance. The functionality and sound quality receive mixed reviews - while some say it works well and sounds great, others report issues with the remote stopping unexpectedly and low volume. The Bluetooth connectivity and durability also get mixed feedback, with some customers reporting connection problems and others noting the product breaking after a few days of use.

      5.0 out of 5 starsVerified Purchase
      Good for gaming station
      Reviewed in the United States on April 1, 2019
      Color: 20 inch white Bluetooth
      1. 0:18
      Easy to install, works well. The normal "white", can be changed from a blue daylight time, to a warm orange tone. Those are plenty bright for normal room lighting. The colors do a good job of filling the room. The remote has the ability to do the basic functions of... See more
      Easy to install, works well. The normal "white", can be changed from a blue daylight time, to a warm orange tone. Those are plenty bright for normal room lighting. The colors do a good job of filling the room. The remote has the ability to do the basic functions of on/off, dimming the main light, changing to preset colors. The app is how you fine tune colors, color changing patterns, and dimming colors. Bluetooth connects easily, no problem with either Spotify or Amazon music. Also, the deepest blue color acts as a black light, which became my favorite setting.

      For install, I didn't realize products outside the US have different colored wires. This has blue and brown. Googled how to connect to to my red white and black, and it worked fine, but it initially surprised me.

    • Cosmos
      4.0 out of 5 starsVerified Purchase
      Awesome light!
      Reviewed in the United States on June 23, 2019
      Color: 15 Inch Star Smart Wifi
      0:25
      Ok when I came across this I was completely excited. I thought it was perfect for my at home gameroom. Its a fantastic product so far just the installation instructions are pretty much nonexistent. Im no expert electrician but I enjoy home DIY. No schooling or job... See more
      Ok when I came across this I was completely excited. I thought it was perfect for my at home gameroom. Its a fantastic product so far just the installation instructions are pretty much nonexistent. Im no expert electrician but I enjoy home DIY. No schooling or job experience just the average DIY joe. It took me awhile to figure out what wires connect to what and Ive read mixed reviews. I seen the seller say it Did not matter to which you connect them. I wasnt too sure about that but I did some more research. My light came with a brown and blue cord. I read browns generally hot wire and blues neutral. I had a red and brown wire in my ceiling so this was indeed confusing. In the end I ended up connecting the brown to MY ceiling red wire and blue to MY ceilings brown wire. It works fine just has a small delay of about 1 second when coming on. Im still not sure why but seems to work well currently. You can change the light from daylight White to the more warm white if you choose to not use the RGBs(multiple different colors it provides) Yes it can be used as just a normal light. The sounds not bad and can easily cover a normal sized room. No you cant link more than one via the same remote. They dont sync. The hardest part is the installation because it simply doesnt tell you how. Then again this is something an electrician or someone EXPERIENCED and confident should be installing. Do some respect and take your time. Once its installed you will love it. Im giving it four stars because it is indeed a fantastic light once you get it hooked up. Im dropping 1 Star for poor instructions. Id also go with the remote instead of the app as it seems more reliable. The rgbs wont move to the music without the APP version but that requires use of your phone. I connected the speaker to my iPhone 10 in about 2 seconds and I stream so far from YouTube. Hopefully this review helps others like myself that was VERY interested in this light. Ive included a video to give you the idea of the sound. I have volume about half way nothing too crazy.

      Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2021

      A few things to know, it is dimmable through the app on your phone. Do NOT install a dimmer switch because then it will not work correctly. The app is not perfect. I have to connect it to Bluetooth once to change the colors. If I want to play music, I have to make a... See more
      A few things to know, it is dimmable through the app on your phone. Do NOT install a dimmer switch because then it will not work correctly. The app is not perfect. I have to connect it to Bluetooth once to change the colors. If I want to play music, I have to make a second connection via Bluetooth. They both connect at the same time. Also, once you log in to Spotify, on the app, you must still open your Spotify app on your phone to actually play music. the speaker is nice and loud. The light is nice and bright. Great purchase.

      5.0 out of 5 starsVerified Purchase
      A Great Light for My Kid's Room
      Reviewed in the United States on June 9, 2020
      Color: 20 inch white Bluetooth
      My kid, a typical early teen, wanted a light that could give her different colors, and when she saw this had a bluetooth speaker built in...she was sold. This was very easy to install...very light weight, so three drywall anchors/screws is more than enough. I installed in... See more
      My kid, a typical early teen, wanted a light that could give her different colors, and when she saw this had a bluetooth speaker built in...she was sold. This was very easy to install...very light weight, so three drywall anchors/screws is more than enough. I installed in a room that has never had an overhead light - just switched outlets, and I didn't have to go through the process of cutting, mounting a box, etc., etc. Just run the wiring from the switch, up the wall into the attic, and a small hole in the ceiling to pass the wires through. It works great, has a lot of function, and the bluetooth speaker, and associated control app works great so far!
